plot: Two guys convince their best girlfriend to take a trip to help her cope with a divorce. On the trip, they are forced to face their fears and fantasies. Reality gets fuzzy, things get messy, and anything is possible.
title: Two Guys & a Gal
plot_es: Two guys convince their best girlfriend to take a trip to help her cope with a divorce. On the trip, they are forced to face their fears and fantasies. Reality gets fuzzy, things get messy, and anything is possible.
plot_en: Two guys convince their best girlfriend to take a trip to help her cope with a divorce. On the trip, they are forced to face their fears and fantasies. Reality gets fuzzy, things get messy, and anything is possible.
